content: 1 The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth; and not I only, but also all they that know the truth;
content_old: 1 The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth; and not I only, but also all they that know the truth;

content: 2 for the truth’s sake which abideth in us, and it shall be with us for ever:
content_old: 2 for the truth’s sake which abideth in us, and it shall be with us for ever:

content: 3 Grace, mercy, peace shall be with us, from God the Father, and from Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
content_old: 3 Grace, mercy, peace shall be with us, from God the Father, and from Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

content: 4 I rejoice greatly that I have found certain of thy children walking in truth, even as we received commandment from the Father.
content_old: 4 I rejoice greatly that I have found certain of thy children walking in truth, even as we received commandment from the Father.

content: 5 And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote to thee a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
content_old: 5 And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote to thee a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.

content: 6 And this is love, that we should walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, even as ye heard from the beginning, that ye should walk in it.
content_old: 6 And this is love, that we should walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, even as ye heard from the beginning, that ye should walk in it.

content: 7 For many deceivers are gone forth into the world, even they that confess not that Jesus Christ cometh in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the antichrist.
content_old: 7 For many deceivers are gone forth into the world, even they that confess not that Jesus Christ cometh in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the antichrist.

content: 8 Look to yourselves, that ye lose not the things which we have wrought, but that ye receive a full reward.
content_old: 8 Look to yourselves, that ye lose not the things which we have wrought, but that ye receive a full reward.

content: 9 Whosoever goeth onward and abideth not in the teaching of Christ, hath not God: he that abideth in the teaching, the same hath both the Father and the Son.
content_old: 9 Whosoever goeth onward and abideth not in the teaching of Christ, hath not God: he that abideth in the teaching, the same hath both the Father and the Son.

content: 10 If any one cometh unto you, and bringeth not this teaching, receive him not into your house, and give him no greeting:
content_old: 10 If any one cometh unto you, and bringeth not this teaching, receive him not into your house, and give him no greeting:

content: 11 for he that giveth him greeting partaketh in his evil works.
content_old: 11 for he that giveth him greeting partaketh in his evil works.

content: 12 Having many things to write unto you, I would not write them with paper and ink: but I hope to come unto you, and to speak face to face, that your joy may be made full.
content_old: 12 Having many things to write unto you, I would not write them with paper and ink: but I hope to come unto you, and to speak face to face, that your joy may be made full.
